name: Boburmirzo Ergashev
contact_message: Feel free to reach out to me!
description: Building modern web applications with React, Next.js, and Node.js
about_me_description: I'm a passionate full-stack JavaScript developer with expertise in building scalable web applications. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies, I create seamless user experiences backed by robust server-side solutions.
my_journey: My journey in web development started with a curiosity about how things work on the internet, and it has evolved into a professional career where I continuously learn and adapt to new technologies. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices.
when_not_coding: When I'm not coding, you can find me contributing to open-source projects, writing technical blogs, or exploring the latest web technologies.
skills_description: Here are some of the technologies and tools I work with:
get_in_touch_description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
project_ecommerce_description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include real-time inventory, payment integration, and admin dashboard.
project_task_description: Collaborative task management tool with real-time updates using Socket.io. Built with React, Express, and PostgreSQL.
project_ai_description: AI-powered content generation tool using OpenAI API. Features markdown editor, template system, and content history.
